name: One, Two, Skip a Few DEMO
name_original: One, Two, Skip a Few DEMO
description:
Use WASD or the arrow keys to move the player (yellow block with an arrow.)

               Collect the red arrows to "load in" its direction. You can then move normally, but the moment you move in the direction the the arrow is facing, your player will warp until it hits a wall. Note that you can warp through "danger" skull blocks when using your "skip" (directional warp,) but they will kill you if you move directly over them. Note that if you move over an arrow but have another one already loaded in, you will keep the previous one and the new one will not be loaded in until you use up the previous one.

Get to the portal (the yellow orb with a moving red line) to win the level.

There are currently only 13 levels so far.
